title: Monster Profile Template
description: Defines a single monster -- a harmful, unnatural creature typically singular or rare. Monsters are distinguished from species by lacking society and from animals by being singular. Origin story is more important than physical appearance for memorability.

nicknames.description: Titles or alternate names used by inhabitants

famous_for.description: What stories do people tell about this monster?

origin.description: How this monster came to exist

accidental_cause.description: If accidental: what happened, who/what caused it, was it once sentient

designed_purpose.description: If designed: why was it created

designed_control.description: If designed: does the creator still control it? Is the creator alive?

evolved_from.description: If evolved: what did it evolve from, what pressure caused it

creator_god.description: God who created or cursed this monster into existence (if applicable)

motivation.description: What drives this monster's behavior -- 'I'm evil' is not sufficient

motivation_detail.description: Specific details of what the monster wants and why

notable_features.description: Notable features with rationale for each

appearance.description: Physical appearance -- design AFTER establishing origins and motivation

lair_description.description: Where the monster lives -- lairs reveal character without exposition

lair_contents.description: What is found in the lair (bones, treasure, victims, traps, evidence)

nocturnal.description: Whether the monster is active at night

range.description: How far from its lair does it travel

trail_evidence.description: What evidence/trail does it leave for trackers

weakness.description: What the monster is vulnerable to

world_view.description: Does it have a world view? How does it see itself?

diet.description: What it eats, whether it eats sentient species, how it hunts

habitat.description: Terrain and climate where this monster is found

species_relationships.description: Does it hate one species specifically? Leave others alone?

society_impact.description: Impact on nearby society -- how is it thought of? Does it affect life there, such as people not traveling in its direction or taking special precautions?

language.description: Can it speak? Which languages? Can it read and write? If so, who taught it?

customs.description: Habits or customs the monster exhibits -- stacking bones, displaying victims, attacking at certain times of month/year/decade

combat.description: How it fights, special attacks, defensive abilities

the_supernatural.description: Is the monster supernatural in any way? Can it perform magic? Is it afraid of magic? Does it have or utilize a supernatural place nearby?

reproduction.description: Can it reproduce? How? Are there offspring?

sympathetic_elements.description: Was it once human? Does it have a tragic backstory? Accidental monsters elicit sympathy.

myths_associated.description: Myths that feature or reference this monster

skills.description: Specific skills beyond supernatural abilities -- what is unusual and what is normal for a creature with its limbs and features

x-cross-references.god-profile: A god may have created this monster
x-cross-references.land-feature-catalog: The monster inhabits specific land features
x-cross-references.species-profile: The monster may target or be associated with specific species
x-cross-references.place-of-interest-profile: The monster's lair may be a place of interest
